title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set, as part of the template requirements. UI should not perform validation in this case.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a table report item. 2. Do not set the dataset. 3. Try creating a new table group.
